algorithm:
New algorithm: 
The new algorithm assigns scores to the bins based on the inverse of the difference between the maximum capacity and the rest capacity of each bin, multiplied by the square root of the item size, and subtracts the inverse of the sum of the square roots of the remaining capacities of all the bins.

Modified code:

```
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    rest_capacity = max_capacity - bins
    rest_capacity_sum = np.sum(rest_capacity)
    scores = (1 / (max_capacity - rest_capacity)) * np.sqrt(item) - (1 / np.sum(np.sqrt(rest_capacity)))
    return scores
